extendedInfo.description: Dealshelve helps you get updated with daily deals from all group buying websites in Malaysia, Philippines and Singapore. Now you can preview the latest deals and browse to the selected deal page easily. You can also filter the deals according to country, city, source and category.All deals are aggregated from group buying sites (a.k.a. Groupon clones) including:Malaysia: Groupon, LivingSocial, MyDeal, Dealmates, Stardeal, MilkADeal, JackCow, GroupMe, StreetDeal, ILoveDiscounts, Hulala, jvBuyer, myiMart, WeBuy, EziVoucher, Myooo, Dealhunt, MadnessDeal, MyCoupon, GroupShare, Syokdeal, BuyDiscount, DealDeal, Deal4Real, EasyCoupon, OhOffer, FBCoupon, WazzUpDeal, iCheapSingapore: Deal.com.sg, Groupon, AllDealsAsia, SuperDeals, BigDeal.SG, StreetDeal, Voucherlicious, VoucherWOW, LootLoot, JuzToday, ShiokDeal, 101GroupDeal, Whee, atCrazy.com, nicedeal.sg, StraitsDeal, moxdeals, DealCreationPhilippines: MetroDeal, Groupon, Dealspot, DealDozen, Gupo, eBay Kuponan, DealAmigos, PnoyDeal, CityPoynt, PinoyGreatDeals, MyDeluxeCity, DealsDiBa, atCrazy.com, CrazyDeals, WowDealsDealshelve will include more countries and more features soon, stay tuned for software updates!Keywords: group buying, collective buying, online coupons, discount vouchers, deals aggregator, deals portal, deals navigator, discounts, Yipit, ILoveDeals, LivingSocial, MyKouponz, Bigsale, The Dealmap

reviews.title: Working fine!
reviews.comment: Working fine on One X. Will rate for 5 stars if user interface is improved. Should display bigger and mote pictures of all the deals
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Back in my phone
reviews.comment: Fast, stable and simple to use. Thanks for ICS update. Please add Deal Grocer & Deal Dozen. Hope it will still be compatible once Jellybean rolls out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Love the idea of all deals under 1 app. My all-time favourite. :)
reviews.author: Ken Lee

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Aggregates like 20 deal sites in sg. I\'m lovin it
reviews.author: Denise Yap

reviews.title: ICS is now supported!
reviews.comment: Now that ICS is supported, this is an excellent app for finding deals from all deal sites! The problem is that some deal sites do not have mobile-friendly page and sites like MyDeal redirects to common page instead of deal page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally works but needs more features
reviews.comment: Work on jellybean nexus. Should at least have a Share feature and not just Open links.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good
reviews.comment: Before I could sort by category but now it just says all. Please fix it then it\'s five stars. Holding back till then. Running on jellybean 4.2.1
reviews.author: Damius Lee

reviews.title: Improvement
reviews.comment: Good but not best. Might try to consolidate all sources and provide the best deal...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Filter not functioning any more
reviews.comment: Can\'t filter by category or source,etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes after ice-cream upgrade
reviews.comment: Force closes whenever I click on deals, ever since I upgraded my Samsung Galaxy SII to Ice-Cream. Please fix this bug!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Shows deals but force close everytime I click on a deal. Remove tt bug and it wld be superb. SE x10 mini pro
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement!
reviews.comment: Great app!! Great idea!! unfortunately as of late, the deal categorization is well unacceptable... The filtering is not as smart as it should be. Imagine a washing ball found under gadgets??!! Another bug is after you come back to the app after visiting the actual merchant site, the search goes back to default. Pls fix this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice app
reviews.comment: excellent deal directory.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Deals.
reviews.comment: Excellent now i can see all great deals here in philippines. Please add widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why its not opening anymore???
reviews.comment: This is a good apps but why recently unable to open it & keep saying unable to connect to server,tried to uninstall & install again but still the same,please fix it!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Please fix. ICS users are at a disadvantage now. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Didn\'t even open in browser, just restart\'s when want to view a deal. Milestone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works in note now
reviews.comment: The new version fixed the unexpected shutdown issue in galaxy note. Great!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: This apps need an update. It keeps on force closing everytime i want to view the deal.

reviews.comment: great app with many different deals
